description:
Enjoy a collection of 300 high-quality jigsaw puzzles of Wonderful Nature, Amazing Animals and Greatest Cities from all around the world. Change the size of your puzzle for increased difficulty and solve jigsaws up to 600 pieces. You can also play with up to 4 players to solve jigsaws together!
 
• 4 different puzzle sizes (30/120/300/600 pieces)
• Easy and accessible touch controls
• Pick up where you left off with the automatic save feature
• Up to 4 player local multiplayer
 
Wonderful Nature:
• Mt. Fuji
• Antarctica
• Patagonia
• Pebble Beach
• Matterhorn
 
Amazing Animals:
• Panda’s
• Elephants
• Killer Whale
• Gorilla’s
• White Tiger
 
Greatest Cities:
• New York City, USA
• Tokyo, Japan
• Paris, France
• Rome, Italy
• Shanghai, China
 
And many more...!
name: Jigsaw Fun 3-in-1 Collection
intro: Solve 300 jigsaw puzzles of Wonderful Nature, Amazing Animals and Greatest Cities. Choose puzzles from 30 to 600 pieces and play solo or together up to 4 players!
